name: Aravind Reddy
title: VMware Engineer
professional_summary: Utilized VMware vSphere 7.x to design and implement virtualized environments, ensuring high availability and performance across multiple ESXi hosts.
Managed vCenter Server 7.0, overseeing the deployment and maintenance of over 100 virtual machines for critical applications.
Configured and optimized vMotion, DRS, and HA to ensure seamless workload migration and resource balancing.
Implemented vSAN for storage virtualization, improving data accessibility and reducing latency across clustered environments.
Maintained and updated VMware templates and snapshots, streamlining VM provisioning processes and reducing deployment times.
Integrated VMware infrastructure with NFS and iSCSI storage solutions, enhancing data management and backup workflows.
Applied security best practices, including role-based access control and encryption, to protect virtualized environments.
Collaborated with network teams to configure VLANs and optimize virtual networking for improved performance.
Automated routine tasks using PowerCLI scripts, reducing manual intervention and minimizing errors in VMware management.
Supported incident and problem management processes, aligning with ITIL standards to ensure rapid resolution of issues.
Performed regular upgrades and patching of VMware infrastructure, maintaining compatibility and security across all components.
Monitored resource utilization using vRealize Operations, identifying and resolving bottlenecks to optimize system performance.
Configured and managed VMware Horizon for virtual desktop infrastructure, supporting remote workforce needs.
Troubleshot complex issues related to ESXi hosts, vCenter Server, and virtual networking, ensuring minimal downtime.
Implemented disaster recovery solutions, including SRM, to ensure business continuity in case of outages.
Conducted training sessions for junior team members on VMware best practices and troubleshooting techniques.
Maintained documentation for VMware environments, including configurations, workflows, and incident resolution steps.
Participated in cross-functional projects, collaborating with systems and storage teams to deliver integrated solutions.

Cloud Platforms: AWS (S3, SageMaker, Lambda, EC2, RDS, Redshift, Bedrock)
Azure (ML Studio, Data Factory, Databricks, Cosmos DB)
GCP (Big Query, Vertex AI, Cloud SQL)
